== Loliem (627027) ==
      
Loliem is a village in the [[Canacona]] taluka of [[South Goa]] district with an area of 4130.8 hectares and harbouring 1248 households with total population of 4797 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[CANACONA]] is at a distance of 15 km. Male population is 2213 and female population is 2584. Scheduled Caste Population is 15 and Scheduled Tribes population is 154. Census Location Code of the village is 627027<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
